item.title: MIUI V14.0.10.0.TMLCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K60 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K60 Ultra China

Codename: corot

Version: V14.0.10.0.TMLCNXM | 13.0

MD5: 42a9fa6017f34195f2f1b0b38f20084c

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to September 2023. Increased system security.
[Camera]
Fix: Image quality for specific scenes
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: WLAN connection for specific scenarios
Fix: Overall stability issues
